name: 陳潔晞
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week	Reading	Listening
1	Introduction	Introduction
2	Unit 1: No place like home	Things I miss from home (p. 10)
3	Unit 1 cont.
4	Unit 2: Been there, done that!	An interview with Tashi Wheele (p. 20)r
5	Unit 2 cont.
6	Unit 3: What a story!	The money jigsaw (p. 28)
7	Unit 3 cont.
8	Mid-term Examination	Mid-term Examination
9	English Proficiency Test	English Proficiency Test
10	Unit 4: Nothing but the truth	My mist memorable lie (p. 33)
11	Unit 4 cont.
12	Unit 5: An eye to the future	Arranging to meet (p.48)
13	Unit 5 cont.
14	Unit 6: Making it big	Radio advertisements (p. 53)
15	Unit 6 cont.
16	Unit 6 cont.
17	Final Examination	Final Examination
18	English Proficiency Test	English Proficiency Test
